scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run gentypes:local && cp ./types.gen.ts ../../apps/website/app/utils/supabase && npm run dbdiff
scripts.gentypes:local: supabase start && supabase gen types typescript --local --schema public > types.gen.ts
scripts.gentypes:production: supabase start && supabase gen types typescript --project-id "$SUPABASE_PROJECT_ID" --schema public > types.gen.ts
scripts.deploy: echo "$SUPABASE_PROJECT_ID" && supabase link --project-ref "$SUPABASE_PROJECT_ID" --password "$SUPABASE_DB_PASSWORD" && supabase db push
